item.title: Cyber Security Interview Questions With Answers
item.description: 50 Cyber Security Interview Questions (With Answers) Top Cyber Security Interview Questions Explain Cryptography It is the science of protecting data from third-party using various methods. It is used to protect sensitive information that shouldn’t be disclosed to anyone other than the owners of the information. Differentiate between Symmetric and Asymmetric encryption Symmetric encryption – In this type of encryption, the same key is used for encryption and decryption of data.
